column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////In a nutshell: Five star food
column3: at three-star prices. Everything I've tried (a couple steaks
column6: most of the sides) has been very good and the drinks
column7: particularly the Sazerac and the Weller Old Fashioned
column8: are fantastic. Service is very good and if you open a tab at the bar
column9: they will give you your card back and keep the tab so you don't have to go back the next day to get it.
